name: Trouble in candyland
description:
A sugary-sweet action-platformer through candyland!

When the birds attack candyland, adventure calls you! However - you'd rather stay home being miserable. When the mysterious Professor Bizzare gives you the Warp Rifle, which doubles as a teleporter and a gun, you are forced to go on a mission to save all of Candyland!

There are 3 different endings, a bad ending, a neutral ending and a true ending. Which one you get depends on how many villagers you save.

Use A and D to move left and right, and space to jump. You can hold S to fall faster. Use your cursor to aim the warp rifle and left click to fire it.
